verses.name: Deuteronomy 28:22
verses.text: The Lord shall smite thee with a consumption, and with a fever, and with an inflammation, and with an extreme burning, and with the sword, and with blasting, and with mildew; and they shall pursue thee until thou perish.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 28:23
verses.text: And thy heaven that is over thy head shall be brass, and the earth that is under thee shall be iron.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 28:24
verses.text: The Lord shall make the rain of thy land powder and dust: from heaven shall it come down upon thee, until thou be destroyed.
